pageTitle: Prime Minister Justin Trudeau meets with Vice President Jusuf Kalla of Indonesia | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Prime Minister Justin Trudeau met today with Vice President Jusuf Kalla of Indonesia.

The Prime Minister and the Vice President discussed the unacceptable situation in Myanmar, and what collaboration may be possible to bring an end to the violence and persecution of the Rohingya Muslim minority, and other ethnic minorities.

The Prime Minister also expressed his deep concern regarding the case of Canadian Neil Bantleman.
